thread.title: Tiny houses for homeless shown off by Mayor Ted Wheeler day before vote to place them in Kenton
thread.title_full: Tiny houses for homeless shown off by Mayor Ted Wheeler day before vote to place them in Kenton

author: Molly Harbarger | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Tiny houses for homeless shown off by Mayor Ted Wheeler day before vote to place them in Kenton
text: Fourteen tiny houses sit in an empty lot next to the Oregon Convention Center waiting for homeless women to move in. Some are little more than a wooden bed in an A-frame, but others have beautiful windows to let in natural light and creative storage space.
